languages.text: "Чувствую, наконец я чувствую хоть что-то..." {n}В широко раскрытых глазах Кассии отражаются ужас и смятение. Ее лицо, шея и руки жестоко разодраны в кровь, а с кончиков когтей стекает вязкая кровь.{/n} "Ах, ну почему вас сразу так много? Красный. Черный. Лиловый. Алый. Желтый. Темно-бордовый... Прочь! Хватит роиться в моих мыслях!"

traits.locale_text: "Чувствую, наконец я чувствую хоть что-то..." {n}В широко раскрытых глазах Кассии отражаются ужас и смятение. Ее лицо, шея и руки жестоко разодраны в кровь, а с кончиков когтей стекает вязкая кровь.{/n} "Ах, ну почему вас сразу так много? Красный. Черный. Лиловый. Алый. Желтый. Темно-бордовый... Прочь! Хватит роиться в моих мыслях!"

languages.text: "I... feel. At last, I feel something..." {n}You see horror and confusion in Cassia's wide-open eyes. Her face, neck, and hands are gruesomely scratched and sticky blood is dripping from the tips of her claw-like fingernails.{/n} "Ah! Why are there so many of you at once? Red. Black. Violet. Scarlet. Yellow. Dark maroon... Away with you! Stop swarming my thoughts!"
languages.original_text: "Чувствую, наконец я чувствую хоть что-то..." {n}В широко раскрытых глазах Кассии отражаются ужас и смятение. Ее лицо, шея и руки жестоко разодраны в кровь, а с кончиков когтей стекает вязкая кровь.{/n} "Ах, ну почему вас сразу так много? Красный. Черный. Лиловый. Алый. Желтый. Темно-бордовый... Прочь! Хватит роиться в моих мыслях!"

traits.locale_text: "I... feel. At last, I feel anything at all..." {n}You see horror and confusion in Cassia's wide-open eyes. Her face, neck, and hands are gruesomely scratched, and sticky blood is dripping from the tips of her claw-like fingernails.{/n} "Ah! Why are there so many of you at once? Red. Black. Violet. Scarlet. Yellow. Dark maroon... Away with you! Stop crawling in my thoughts!"

Yellow. Dark maroon... Away with you! Stop swarming my thoughts!"

languages.text: 「私、感じます。ようやく感じることができる…」{n}カシアの見開かれた目には恐怖と混乱が見て取れる。彼女の顔、首、手は無惨にひっかかれ、爪の先端からはベタベタとした血が滴り落ちている。{/n}「ああ！なぜ一度こんなにたくさん？赤。黒。紫。緋色。黄色。濃い栗色…消えろ！私の頭の中に群がるのはやめて！」
languages.original_text: "I... feel. At last, I feel something..." {n}You see horror and confusion in Cassia's wide-open eyes. Her face, neck, and hands are gruesomely scratched and sticky blood is dripping from the tips of her claw-like fingernails.{/n} "Ah! Why are there so many of you at once? Red. Black. Violet. Scarlet. Yellow. Dark maroon... Away with you! Stop swarming my thoughts!"

traits.locale_text: 「私、感じます。ようやく感じることができる…」{n}カシアの見開かれた目には恐怖と混乱が見て取れる。彼女の顔、首、手は無惨にひっかかれ、爪の先端からはベタベタとした血が滴り落ちている。{/n}「ああ！なぜ一度こんなにたくさん？赤。黒。紫。緋色。黄色。濃い栗色…消えろ！私の頭の中に群がるのはやめて！」

languages.text: “我……能感觉到了，我的感觉终于恢复了……”{n}卡西娅瞪大了眼睛，目光中充满了恐惧与困惑。她的脸颊、脖子和手上带着可怕的抓痕，黏糊糊的血从她爪状的指尖滴下。{/n}“啊！为什么同时出现了这么多颜色？红色、黑色、紫罗兰色、血红色、黄色、黑褐色……快消失吧！别再纠缠我了！”
languages.original_text: "I... feel. At last, I feel something..." {n}You see horror and confusion in Cassia's wide-open eyes. Her face, neck, and hands are gruesomely scratched and sticky blood is dripping from the tips of her claw-like fingernails.{/n} "Ah! Why are there so many of you at once? Red. Black. Violet. Scarlet. Yellow. Dark maroon... Away with you! Stop swarming my thoughts!"

traits.locale_text: “我，呃，能感觉到了。我的感觉终于恢复了……”{n}卡西娅瞪大了眼睛，目光中充满了恐惧与困惑。她的脸颊、脖子和手上带着可怕的抓痕，黏糊糊的血从她爪状的指尖滴下。{/n}“啊！为什么同时出现了这么多颜色？红色、黑色、紫罗兰色、血红色、黄色、黑褐色……快消失吧！别再纠缠我了！”

languages.text: «Estoy... sintiendo. Por fin puedo sentir algo...». {n}Cassia abre los ojos de par en par, y ves en ellos el reflejo de su terror y su confusión. Presenta unos arañazos horrorosos en la cara, el cuello y las manos y una sangre viscosa gotea de las puntas de sus uñas como garras.{/n} «¡Ah! ¿Por qué hay tantos de repente? Rojo, negro, violeta, escarlata, amarillo, granate... ¡Fuera! ¡Salid de mi cabeza!».
languages.original_text: "I... feel. At last, I feel something..." {n}You see horror and confusion in Cassia's wide-open eyes. Her face, neck, and hands are gruesomely scratched and sticky blood is dripping from the tips of her claw-like fingernails.{/n} "Ah! Why are there so many of you at once? Red. Black. Violet. Scarlet. Yellow. Dark maroon... Away with you! Stop swarming my thoughts!"

traits.locale_text: «Estoy... sintiendo. Por fin puedo sentir algo...». {n}Cassia abre los ojos de par en par, y ves en ellos el reflejo de su terror y su confusión. Presenta unos arañazos horrorosos en la cara, el cuello y las manos y una sangre viscosa gotea de las puntas de sus uñas como garras.{/n} «¡Ah! ¿Por qué hay tantos de repente? Rojo, negro, violeta, escarlata, amarillo, granate... ¡Fuera! ¡Salid de mi cabeza!».

languages.text: "Ich ... fühle. Endlich fühle ich etwas ..." {n}Du siehst in Cassias weit aufgerissenen Augen Entsetzen und Verwirrung. Ihr Gesicht, ihr Hals und ihre Hände sind grauenhaft zerkratzt. Klebriges Blut tropft von ihren klauenähnlichen Fingernägeln.{/n} "Ah! Warum gibt es so viele von Euch gleichzeitig? Rot. Schwarz. Violett. Purpur. Gelb. Dunkelbraun ... Verschwindet! Raus aus meinen Gedanken!"
languages.original_text: "I... feel. At last, I feel something..." {n}You see horror and confusion in Cassia's wide-open eyes. Her face, neck, and hands are gruesomely scratched and sticky blood is dripping from the tips of her claw-like fingernails.{/n} "Ah! Why are there so many of you at once? Red. Black. Violet. Scarlet. Yellow. Dark maroon... Away with you! Stop swarming my thoughts!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich, äh, fühle. Endlich fühle ich etwas ..." {n}Du siehst in Cassias weit aufgerissenen Augen Entsetzen und Verwirrung. Ihr Gesicht, ihr Hals und ihre Hände sind grauenhaft zerkratzt. Klebriges Blut tropft von ihren klauenähnlichen Fingernägeln.{/n} "Ah! Warum gibt es so viele von Euch gleichzeitig? Rot. Schwarz. Violett. Purpur. Gelb. Dunkelbraun ... Hinfort mit Euch! Hört auf, meine Gedanken zu überrennen!"

languages.text: « Je... ressens. Enfin, je ressens quelque chose... » {n}Vous lisez une horreur mêlée de confusion dans les yeux écarquillés de Cassia. Son visage, son cou et ses mains portent des marques de griffures, et du sang poisseux goutte de ses ongles en forme de griffes.{/n} « Ah ! Pourquoi êtes-vous si {mf|nombreux|nombreuse} ? Rouge. Noir. Violet. Écarlate. Jaune. Marron foncé... Partez ! Cessez d'envahir mes pensées ! »
languages.original_text: "I... feel. At last, I feel something..." {n}You see horror and confusion in Cassia's wide-open eyes. Her face, neck, and hands are gruesomely scratched and sticky blood is dripping from the tips of her claw-like fingernails.{/n} "Ah! Why are there so many of you at once? Red. Black. Violet. Scarlet. Yellow. Dark maroon... Away with you! Stop swarming my thoughts!"

traits.locale_text: « Je... ressens. Enfin, je ressens quelque chose... » {n}Vous lisez une horreur mêlée de confusion dans les yeux écarquillés de Cassia. Son visage, son cou et ses mains portent des marques de griffures, et du sang poisseux goutte de ses ongles en forme de griffes.{/n} « Ah ! Pourquoi êtes-vous si {mf|nombreux|nombreuse} ? Rouge. Noir. Violet. Écarlate. Jaune. Marron foncé... Partez ! Cessez d'envahir mes pensées ! »

languages.text: "Bir his... Nihayet bir şey hissediyorum..." {n}Cassia'nın fal taşı gibi açılmış gözleri, düştüğü dehşeti ve kafa karışıklığını gösteriyor. Yüzü, boynu ve elleri korkunç bir şekilde çizilmiş, pençeyi andıran tırnaklarının ucundansa yapış yapış kan damlaları akıyor.{/n} "Aman! Neden bir anda bu kadar çok oldunuz? Kırmızı. Siyah. Menekşe. Sarı. Bordo... Defolun! Zihnime musallat olmayın artık!"
languages.original_text: "I... feel. At last, I feel something..." {n}You see horror and confusion in Cassia's wide-open eyes. Her face, neck, and hands are gruesomely scratched and sticky blood is dripping from the tips of her claw-like fingernails.{/n} "Ah! Why are there so many of you at once? Red. Black. Violet. Scarlet. Yellow. Dark maroon... Away with you! Stop swarming my thoughts!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir his... Nihayet bir şey hissediyorum..." {n}Cassia'nın fal taşı gibi açılmış gözlerinde dehşet ve kafa karışıklığını görebiliyorsun. Yüzü, boynu ve elleri korkunç bir şekilde çizilmiş; pençeyi andıran tırnaklarının ucundansa yapış yapış kan damlaları akıyor.{/n} "Aman! Neden bir anda bu kadar çok oldunuz?! Kırmızı. Siyah. Menekşe. Sarı. Bordo... Defolun! Zihnime musallat olmayın artık!"
